You're expected to be provocative- it's like going on the Late Review. Is CCTV creeping too far? It's been around for 25 years, but should CCTV be used to give parking tickets or enforce bus lane rules? Can Kate's dress stay a secret?

. Labour MPs have been relentlessly pursuing the case and will regard Mr Andy Coulson 's departure as a major success, but it will not stop their pursuit of News International. Mr Ed Miliband said: The cloud of allegations surrounding Andy Coulson 's tenure at the News of the World raised real questions about his ability to be at the heart of the Downing Street machine. "I think there are questions about David Cameron 's judgment about hanging on to him as long as he did. didn't even hear him. As David Stern handed him the MVP trophy, all Allen Iverson could think of was one thing when he was asked to speak. "Where's my coach at?" he asked. Where's Coach Larry Brown ? It was a Grant Hill touch by Allen Iverson to seek out Larry Brown , his coach for the past 3 1/2 seasons. For a player often described as selfish and immature, it was a giant step toward superstardom. "

Meanwhile, some are suggesting that Eric Schmidt is walking away now because he senses that Google's fortunes have peaked. Along with the continued rise of Facebook and Twitter, InformationWeek notes: He is stepping aside just as Google spins the wheel on its riskiest bet yet: the launch of Chrome OS, the company's Web-based operating system.
